Metadata.title: GloRe - Global Volunteering Network
Metadata.description: GloRe is an open network that aims to enlarge its audience both of volunteers and NGOs all over the world to make certificates available to everybody.
Metadata.pwaDescription: Install GloRe on your device to access courses, receive notifications, and manage your certificates offline.
Metadata.keywords: GloRe, volunteering, global network, NGO, certificate, soft skills, courses, learning, community

common.copyright: Â© {year} Associazione Joint. All rights reserved.

auth/recovery.subject: Reset your GloRe password
auth/recovery.preview: You recently requested to reset your password for your GloRe account. To complete this process, please follow the secure link provided in this email to create a new password and regain access to your account.
auth/recovery.intro: You recently requested to reset your password for your account.
auth/recovery.buttonInstruction: Click the button below to reset it:
auth/recovery.manualLink: If the button above does not work, open the following link in your browser:
auth/recovery.instructions: This password reset link is valid for the next 24 hours.
auth/recovery.footer: You're receiving this email because you requested a password reset for your GloRe account. If you didn't request it, please ignore this email or <emailLink>let us know</emailLink>.

auth/invite.subject: You've been invited to join GloRe
auth/invite.preview: You've been invited to join the GloRe platform as a team member. Click the link in this email to accept the invitation and set up your account.
auth/invite.intro: You've been invited to join the GloRe platform as a team member.
auth/invite.buttonInstruction: Click the button below to accept the invitation and set up your account:
auth/invite.manualLink: If the button above does not work, open the following link in your browser:
auth/invite.instructions: This invitation link is valid for the next 24 hours.
auth/invite.footer: You're receiving this email because you've been invited to join GloRe. If you didn't expect this invitation, please ignore this email or <emailLink>let us know</emailLink>.

Auth.loginMessage: Enter an email or username to login to your account
Auth.passwordRequestMessage: Enter your email or username to receive a password reset link.
Auth.emailSentMessage: Check your email <email></email> to get the password reset link. If you don't see it, check your spam folder or try again.
Auth.passwordResetMessage: Enter a new password for your account.
Auth.passwordUpdatedMessage: You can now log in to the GloRe Network with your new password.
Auth.invalidTokenMessage: Your password reset link is invalid or has expired. Please request a new one.
Auth.invalidPasswordResetMessage: There was an issue resetting your password, please request a new link and try again.
Auth.networkError: A network error occurred, please try again or contact us if the problem persists
Auth.signupDialogMessage:
Currently, you can sign up to GloRe only with an invitation from your organization.

If your organization is part of the GloRe network and you want to get access as a volunteer, tutor or coordinator, ask a representative to send you an invitation.

For more information, please visit our website.
Auth.signupMessage: Don't have an account? See <link>how to sign up</link>
Auth.userRequired: Insert a valid email or username
Auth.insertNewPassword: Insert a new password to continue
Auth.passwordRequirements: Must contain a lowercase and uppercase letter, a number, and a symbol
Auth.passwordSameAsOld: The new password cannot be the same as the old one

Courses.completeLessonsToProceed: Complete all previous steps to proceed
Courses.correctAnswerMessage: Great job, you've understood this concept correctly.
Courses.description: GloRe offers a wide range of learning courses to help you develop your soft skills and knowledge. Each course is designed to be interactive and engaging, providing you with the tools you need to succeed in your personal and professional life. After completing at least 3 courses, you will be able to request a certificate of completion.
Courses.descriptionAdmin: As an admin, you can manage the courses available on the platform. You can create and publish new courses, edit existing ones, and archive courses that are no longer relevant.
Courses.descriptionEditor: As an editor, you can create, edit and translate courses across the platform.
Courses.notFoundMessage: The course you are looking for does not exist or has been moved
Courses.questionsSubtitle: Reply with true or false to the following {count, plural, =1 {statement} other {statements}} and test your knowledge.
Courses.replyToProceed: Complete {type, select, questions {the quiz} skill_evaluation {the evaluation} subskill_evaluations {all evaluations} other {}} to proceed
Courses.skillEvaluationSubtitle: How would you rate your general skills in this area?
Courses.lessonType: {type, select, descriptive {Reading} questions {Quiz} skill_evaluation {Self-assessment} subskill_evaluations {Self-assessment} other {Step}}
Courses.subskillEvaluationsSubtitle: Give a score from 1 to 5 to {count, plural, =1 {the following statement} other {each of the following statements}}.
Courses.title: Learning courses
Courses.wrongAnswerMessage: Don't worry, you can always review the material again.
Courses.reviewModeMessage: In review mode you can interact with all the steps of the course, but your replies can't be changed
Courses.completedTitle: Congratulations, you've completed {count, plural, =1 {your first} =2 {your second} =3 {your third} other {another}} course!
Courses.completedTitleAll: Congratulations, you've completed all the courses!
Courses.completedMessage: Review the steps or go back to all courses to continue your learning.
Courses.completedRequestCertificate: You can now request a certificate to verify your skills!
Courses.completeIncludeInCertificate: You can now include this course in your certificate!
Courses.syncErrorMessage: A synchronization error occurred, please refresh the page
Courses.publishCourseMessage: The course will become visible in the selected languages
Courses.unpublishCourseMessage: The course will not be visible on the platform
Courses.emptyMessage: There are no courses available in this section
Courses.emptyMessageFiltered: Try to update the filters to view other courses
Courses.emptyMessageNotStarted: You've already started all the available courses ð
Courses.emptyMessageInProgress: You don't have any courses in progress
Courses.emptyMessageCompleted: You haven't completed any courses yet
Courses.selectAtLeastOneLanguage: You must select at least one language
Courses.name: Name
Courses.updateFilters: Try to update the filters to view other courses
Courses.emptyMessageArchived: No course has been yet archived
Courses.courseTypeIntroductoryDescription: An introductory course provides foundational knowledge on a topic.
Courses.courseTypeSoftSkillDescription: A soft skill course focuses on developing interpersonal and professional skills.
Courses.courseSlugDescription: The URL slug is used to create the course's web address. It should be unique and descriptive.
Courses.courseDescriptionPlaceholder: Describe what students will learn in this course...
Courses.softSkillNotice: For soft skill courses, the title and description will also be used to describe the skill itself.
Courses.settingsDescription: Global settings that apply to the course regardless of language
Courses.softSkillNoticeTitle: You are modifying a soft skill
Courses.fillSettingsFields: Please fill in the required fields
Courses.noTitleProvided: You must provide a title to save the course
Courses.infoSettingsDescription: Information that must be translated and localized
Courses.newCourseDescription: Fill in the basic information to create a new course. You can add content and translations later.
Courses.skillGroupDescription: Choose the skill group this course belongs to.
Courses.invalidSlugFormat: Invalid slug format. Only lowercase letters, numbers, and hyphens are allowed.
Courses.courseSlugTaken: This URL slug is already in use. Please choose another one.
Courses.confirmArchiveTitle: Are you sure you want to archive this course?
Courses.confirmArchiveMessage: Archiving this course will remove it from the list of active courses. You will find the course in the archived section, where you can restore it later if needed.
Courses.confirmUnarchiveTitle: Are you sure you want to unarchive this course?
Courses.confirmUnarchiveMessage: Unarchiving this course will make it visible again in the list of active courses.
Courses.courseArchivedError: Failed to archive course, please try again
Courses.confirmDeleteTitle: Are you sure you want to delete this course?
Courses.confirmDeleteMessage: Deleting this course is permanent and cannot be undone. All associated data will be lost.
Courses.courseDeletedError: Failed to delete course, please try again

Certificates.description: GloRe certificates are an official recognition of your volunteering experience and acquired soft skills. They are issued by GloRe and can be shared on your social media profiles or added to your CV. You can request your certificate after completing at least 3 courses with a final evaluation of at least 3 out of 5.
Certificates.notFoundMessage: The certificate you are looking for does not exist or has been moved
Certificates.title: Your certificate
Certificates.certificateMessagePost: carried out a volunteer activity at {org}, during which they demonstrated commitment, team spirit, and interpersonal skills, acquiring valuable soft skills.
Certificates.requestCertificateTitle: You can now request your GloRe certificate!
Certificates.requestCertificateMessage: Create your certificate and wait for a member of your organization to approve it.
Certificates.invalidCoursesTitle: You can't request a certificate at the moment
Certificates.invalidCoursesMessage: You've rated some of your skills less than {rating} starts. You need a higher grade to request a certificate. Go back to the courses section to complete new courses and get higher ratings.
Certificates.missingCoursesTitle: You need to complete more courses to request a certificate
Certificates.missingCoursesMessage: We require you to complete at least {count} learning courses to request a certification. Go back to the learning section to complete more courses.
Certificates.alreadyHave: You already have a certificate with this organization
Certificates.cantRequest: You can't request a certificate yet
